# Crippling Strike
## Overview
*Crippling Strike\* (Ex):* A rogue with this ability can sneak attack opponents with such precision that her blows weaken and hamper them. An opponent damaged by one of her sneak attacks also takes 2 points of Strength damage.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 69

*Crippling Strike\* (Ex):* A rogue with this ability can sneak attack opponents with such precision that her blows weaken and hamper them. An opponent damaged by one of her sneak attacks also takes 2 points of Strength or Dexterity damage, decided by the rogue. The rogue must be at least 10th level before selecting this talent.

**Source:** Legendary Rogues (Legendary Games), pg. 10
